title: Secular music of the Renaissance
brief_description: David Munroe and the Early English Consort of London present English and Italian secular music of the Renaissance. The instruments, which are introduced before each piece of music, include cornet, sackbut, shawm, crumhorn, cittern, chitarrone and pandora.
